definition: to withdraw/to pull back/to contract/to shrink/to reduce/abbreviation/also pr. [su4]
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)

sentences.english: It provides an optional zoom window for precise shots.
sentences.chinese: 它提供了一個便於精確抓圖的縮放選項窗口。

sentences.english: An Advanced Eyedropper, ColorPicker and Page Zoomer.
sentences.chinese: 一個高級取色器和頁面縮放工具。

sentences.english: Refers to front to back movement of the pantograph on the machine.
sentences.chinese: 指在機器的縮放儀上做前後運動。

sentences.english: Tinea capitis is manifested by pustular eruptions of the scalp, with scaling and bald patches.
sentences.chinese: 頭癬是補丁表現爲膿皰爆發的禿頭頭皮，具有縮放和。

sentences.english: There seems to be a problem with the retractable earphone cord.
sentences.chinese: 似乎有個問題是針對可縮放的耳機線。

sentences.english: Zooming also works well in this release.
sentences.chinese: 此版本的縮放表現的也不錯。

sentences.english: This method prepends the scaling matrix to the transformation.
sentences.chinese: 這個方法會將縮放矩陣預先規劃給轉換。

sentences.english: On the world map, scroll to zoom in and out.
sentences.chinese: 在世界地圖畫面中可縮放地圖。

sentences.english: The library is feature-rich in functions, including rotation, animation, scaling and drawing curves, rectangles and circles.
sentences.chinese: 功能極其豐富，包括旋轉，動畫，縮放等。

sentences.english: The zoom bar that controls horizontal scale appears under the graph.
sentences.chinese: 控制水平比例的縮放條出現在關係圖的下方。

sentences.english: Notice how the image is scaled to fit the selected extent.
sentences.chinese: 注意圖像是如何縮放以適合所選範圍的。

sentences.english: This window cannot be destroyed, resized or iconified.
sentences.chinese: 這個窗口不能被銷燬，縮放或者圖標化。

sentences.english: The camera zoomed in on audience members tearing up as well.
sentences.chinese: 當觀衆們頻頻拭淚時，閃光燈來回縮放。

sentences.english: Embroidery machine keyboard keys used for positioning of the pantograph or frame.
sentences.chinese: 繡花機鍵盤按鍵，用來定位繡框或者縮放儀。

sentences.english: To ensure scannability, do not scale clipboard images in your document.
sentences.chinese: 爲了保證可掃描性，不要縮放文檔中的剪貼板圖像。

sentences.english: Multi-Touch gestures are commonly use for zooming and roatating features, nothing more.
sentences.chinese: 多觸控手勢通常用於縮放和旋轉特性，此外就沒有了。
